mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_price, goods_type, goods_brand, goods_spc, goods_pic, goods_createdate, goods_shelflife, create_time, status, mark
mapper.select:
select
from tb_goods where status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC

mapper.update:
update tb_goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_brand = #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_spc = #{goodsSpc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_createdate = #{goodsCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_shelflife = #{goodsShelflife,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_brand = #{goodsBrand,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_spc = #{goodsSpc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_createdate = #{goodsCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_shelflife = #{goodsShelflife,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
